thread.title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series
thread.title_full: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series
text:
Photo: Jeff Christensen, AP Image 1 of / 2 2 FILE - In this May 25, 2010 file photo, author Richelle Mead poses for a portrait in New York. Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday, Oct. 26, 2015, that “Vampire Academy” author Mead’s “The Glittering Court” will launch April 12. The publisher is calling the fantasy series “a mix of Elizabethan and frontier worlds,” featuring three girls on a “search of empowerment and love.” FILE - In this May 25, 2010 file photo, author Richelle Mead poses for a portrait in New York. Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday, Oct. 26, 2015, that “Vampire Academy” author Mead’s “The ... more Image 2 of 2 FILE - In this May 25, 2010 file photo, author Richelle Mead poses for a portrait in New York. Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday, Oct. 26, 2015, that “Vampire Academy” author Mead’s “The Glittering Court” will launch April 12. The publisher is calling the fantasy series “a mix of Elizabethan and frontier worlds,” featuring three girls on a “search of empowerment and love.” FILE - In this May 25, 2010 file photo, author Richelle Mead poses for a portrait in New York. Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday, Oct. 26, 2015, that “Vampire Academy” author Mead’s “The ... more 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series 1 / 2 Back to Gallery NEW YORK (AP) — "Vampire Academy" author Richelle Mead is giving life to a new series.
Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday that Mead's "The Glittering Court" will launch April 12. The publisher is calling the fantasy series "a mix of Elizabethan and frontier worlds," featuring three girls on a "search of empowerment and love."
Mead's previous series also include "Bloodlines," ''Georgina Kincaid" and "Dark Swan."
